Key Match Events: Taskin Ahmed was named Player of the Match
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Brisbane Cricket Ground, Woolloongabba, Brisbane
Others: The match was the 28th in Group 2 of the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2022-23
The toss was won by Bangladesh, who elected to bat first
Points were awarded to Bangladesh 2 and Zimbabwe 0
The match was officiated by Marais Erasmus, Nitin Menon, Chris Gaffaney, Kumar Dharmasena, and Chris Broad
